msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />We have, you know, totes the same !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />YOU designed yours? So unique! So chic! I L-O-V-E love it!I mean, how can you NOT be obsessed with the cutest of cute DIY projects like this!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That is WAY familiar Oh! I know why!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I legit have the same one! It's the same shape, but mine's got a different style than yours.It's SO exciting that we can show the world our diff styles!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, you have , ?!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ohmigosh! ME. TOO! TWINSIES!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />At my place, I have that same !Except<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />oh! I get it! You designed the pattern, huh? So. Cool.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That â€” GET. OUT! I totes have the same one! What a coinkydink!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I thought we both had, you know, the fabbest of taste? But this proves it!
